actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide that vocational schools in a State which are designated as postsecondary schools by the State educational agency shall be eligible as institutions for purposes of basic educational opportunity grants.

summary.text: Provides that vocational schools in a State which are designated as postsecondary schools by the State educational agency shall be eligible as institutions for basic educational opportunity grants under the Higher Education Act of 1965.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide that vocational schools in a State which are designated as postsecondary schools by the State educational agency shall be eligible as institutions for purposes of basic educational opportunity grants.
